title: Connection issue
body: I've just lost 3 games due to not being able to connect. I can log in, queue for a game and select champ all fine, but once it goes into game my screen goes blank and the loading screen does not appear. I've tried restarting my computer and the client several times. Pressing 'reconnect' literally does nothing. Goodbye MMR and 60 points lol. Please fix or reply to me as to how to fix this problem...

replies.body: yeah same, i was fine playing many games while the warning was active then suddenly it stops working. Although somehow i don't think they are going to fix it on a Sunday :'(
If you are running avast, one of the updated lol files may be in your virus chest. If you restore it and add it to the exception list it may work again for you.
nevermind I found it, thank you. hope it works.
Where's the virus chest? because I am running Avast indeed. It sucks because im on that low priority crap now..3 games lost kinda uscks too.

I would suggest turning off your firewall and any AV you have on the computer. Reinstall League and if the issue persists after that you either have something wrong with your computer or your router :)
PROBLEM STILL PERSISTING... PLEASE HELP. ACCOUNT SUFFERING CONSEQUENCES DUE TO THIS...
